item.title: Recapping my first racing season
item.description: Note: Read more about my cycling prior to entering the racing scene here. I started racing in March 2022, which I soon learned is already halfway through the spring racing season here in Arizona. I knew little about bike racing (tactical or logistical) and had no idea what my strengths or weaknesses might be. It was messy, and each event taught me some vital lessons. Event Calendar Letâ€™s get right to it, then.

item.title: The riding before the racing
item.description: Bikes have been part of my life in some capacity for most of my life. Walmart bikes as a kid, street BMX bikes as a teenager, fixed-gear bikes in college, and road bikes as a young adult. This relationship was casual and adventurous, focusing more on getting lost with a camera and less on training zones. After moving from San Franciso to Phoenix, my morning rides went from “climbing coastal mountains and crossing the golden gate bridge” to “riding from flat suburbs to flat farmland.
